nodes.text: Serrath was a Chagrian male representative of Esstran Exports during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. He frequented the Cartel Bazaar on the Republic space station Carrick Station.

The Reputation Vendor for Esstran Exports on the Republic Fleet, Serrath was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic on May 4, 2015 along with the Core Worlds and Deep Core Explorer Packs—the first of the Explorer Packs, Cartel Market packs to which the Esstran Exports Reputation corresponds. Unlike other Reputation Vendors, Serrath does not appear in the Cartel Bazaar on both factions' fleets; instead, Malievo Valaine is the Imperial faction's vendor.
